item.title: Teleport commands?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

hi i need help makign a teleport command, i want to make one to the heroes guild caves for mining, but the thing is, when i did it, and i do ::mining, it doesnt work! i have the coordinates and everything, but yeah, checked google, checked some posts didnt work! heres what i put.

source:pkplanet v2
client:pkplanet official source

                                           private void customCommand(String command) {

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mining”)) {
if(!inCombat) {
toX = 2916;
toY = 9912;
} else {
sM(“you can’t teleport in combat!”);
}
}
if(command.startsWith(“addobj”) && playerRights > 2){
int objid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
int absx = absX;
int absy = absY;
appendToObjSpawn(objid, absx, absy);
sM(“Object added.”);
}

this is how it looks, the middle one is mining, (the one i made) and the other ones just game with the source, is it like colliding and not working? am i doing the wrong code?

Read full topic
